high_descs: Turn around and go to the sink across from the toilet and nearest to the wall.
Take the rag from the sink.
Turn around and go to the tub to your right.
Place the rag in the tub, to the left of the soap.
anns.task_desc: Place a rag in the tub.

high_descs: Move to the sink on the right.
Pick up the rag from the sink.
Bring the rag to the tub.
Put the rag in the tub.
anns.task_desc: Put a rag in the tub.

high_descs: grab the cloth out of the sink
place the cloth inside the bathtub
anns.task_desc: place a black cloth inside the bathtub
